## SceneNode.findNodeByName() method

Finds a scene node by name.

If multiple nodes share the same name, returns the first match encountered during traversal.

**Signature:**

```typescript
findNodeByName<T extends SceneNode>(name: string): T;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

name


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Node name to match.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

T

The first matching node, or `null` if not found.

## Remarks

Names are not guaranteed unique. Prefer IDs for stable references.
